articles.title: Charles Dolan, media pioneer and Cablevision founder, dies at 98 - Newsday
articles.description: Dolan founded Home Box Office Inc., later known as HBO and American Movie Classics, and launched the country's first 24-hour cable channel for local news.
articles.content:
Charles F. Dolan, a media and telecommunications pioneer who founded Cablevision Systems Corp., has died, a family spokesperson said Saturday. He was 98.
